# areasOfInterest

**Instance Property**

Common names of the area in which the place resides.

## Declaration

```swift
areasOfInterest?: string[];
```

## Discussion

For example, the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Place/areasOfInterest] for a specific location in Golden Gate Park in San Francisco, California, are `["Lindley Meadow", "Golden Gate Park"]`.

## Place name and category

- **name**: The name of the place.
- **formattedAddress**: The address of the place, formatted using its conventions of its country or region.
- **pointOfInterestCategory**: The category of the place.
